src/entities/PhotonTorpedo.ts.description: PhotonTorpedo now uses THREE.Points with BufferGeometry for particle-based rendering. Center position tracked separately for collision detection. Particles randomized each frame for scrambled effect.

src/game/Game.ts.description: fireTorpedo() now creates dual torpedoes from port/starboard wing positions. Uses player's pitchObject and yawObject quaternions to transform offset vectors (-0.6, 0, -0.5) and (0.6, 0, -0.5) relative to ship rotation.
